desc: VelaRosa is a candle holder and home diffuser that quickly fills any room with your candle fragrance using a quiet fan. When the fan stops, the candle flame is automatically extinguished. Whether it's a Yankee Candle, or one of your other scented candles, this candle fragrance diffuser improves the scent throw.

layout.text: Decorate your home with ambiance and fragrance
The home fragrance diffuser that freshens your room in 10 minutes
